metadata.title: Infectious Complications Following Solid Organ Transplantation

abstract.original_text: Infections Solid organ transplant Critical care Intensive care unit (ICU) Sepsis

sentences.segment_text: Infections Solid organ transplant Critical care Intensive care unit ( ICU ) Sepsis

abstract.original_text: Solid organ transplant recipients are a complex group of patients who require a low threshold of suspicion regarding infection, and given their underlying immunosuppression, mortality and morbidity are high. Individually they require assessment of their net state of immunosuppression and subsequent thorough evaluation of infectious causes. Early diagnosis is key along with appropriate, tailored treatment.
